short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a tab to display the fishtank live stream.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fishtank.live cams for your viewing pleasure. Click display options to pick which cams to view. Displaying too many cams will use up a lot of memory.

Expand button shows fullscreen of cam. Use buttons or arrow keys to cycle through selected cams in fullscreen. Use ESC key or button to exit out of it. Toggle show rooms to have highlighted areas to click on and bring you to that room!

Hide button to remove video from display.

Arrows to rearrange videos.

Change number of columns to change how videos are displayed. Change how many columns each video player takes up (only available when number of columns are not auto).

It's my first go at this so for any bugs, just reload the extension, if it's still broken lmk. (check my github for the latest version: tony12288221/fishtankExtension)
